source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This is a scenic aerial shot of a city harbor at dawn or dusk. The calm water is filled with numerous fishing boats, some clustered in groups and others anchored alone. In the background, a modern city skyline with several prominent skyscrapers rises against a hazy sky, creating a striking contrast between the traditional maritime activity and the urban development.

The camera slowly ascends, offering an expanding view of the harbor. Most of the boats are stationary, bobbing gently on the water. A few small boats can be seen moving slowly across the bay.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: 1. All of the boats are stationary, though perhaps bobbing on the water. There are no small boats moving slowly across the bay.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: 1. The video accurately depicts the boats as stationary, gently bobbing on the water. However, contrary to the caption, there are no small boats moving slowly across the bay.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: 1. The boats are all stationary, gently bobbing on the water. However, contrary to the caption, there are no small boats moving slowly across the bay.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly states that a few small boats are moving slowly across the bay.
